Traits.Name: Legend
Traits.Description: Takes 1 turn after every player character takes a turn. If slow, only one of its turns is affected.

Actions.Name: Juggernaut
Actions.Description: Clear a status, mark, or all blights affecting this character.

SetupTraits.Name: Encounter Budget
SetupTraits.Description: This foe takes up points equal to the number of players in an encounter budget.
